thread.title: TV News | Watch: This 'Extra' chewing gum ad has the internet BAWLING - although it's very familiar...
thread.title_full: TV News | Watch: This 'Extra' chewing gum ad has the internet BAWLING - although it's very familiar... - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: TV News | Watch: This 'Extra' chewing gum ad has the internet BAWLING - although it's very familiar...
text:
THE FEELS. This will have you in a ball at this hour of a Monday, but its DEFINITELY worth a watch - just ask the other 3.5million people who've viewed it already...
Entitled "A girl. A guy. And a stick of gum. See their love story unwrap. #GiveExtragetextra", it follows the story of Sarah and Juan, who meet and fall in love. Everything culminates in a trip to an art gallery, where there are little illustrations depicting their journey.
Reaction to the commercial has ranged from....
Screw you #extragumcommercial Now I am questioning life as I lay in a puddle of my own pathetic tears of feels! #allthefeels #damnlove
— Kerry Hassan (@ANOTHERZ0MBIE) October 9, 2015 to...
How is this a gum commercial? It needs to be a novel and a film. This just isn't enough. https://t.co/memrDirLv0 #GiveExtraGetExtra
— SAM (@sammpereira) October 9, 2015
Watch it a few more times. It gets even more precious. #ExtraGumCommercial
— Claire Lummus (@clairelummus) October 11, 2015 If anything, this just proves yet again how damn thoughtful and romantic Will Sliney is. He's the Ballycotton born Marvel illustrator who pretty much proposed to the love of his life in a rather similar fashion last month. MORE FEELS!
So last night I surprised the amazing Laura O' Callaghan with a surprise birthday party, which turned into a surprise...
Posted by William Sliney on Saturday, September 12, 2015 MORE: Orange weather warning set to ruin all of our weekends
MORE: A stupid amount of Irish people are getting away with not paying for penalty points
MORE: 91% of Irish people would have potatoes in their death row meal
